Title: Relates to community hiring and workforce development
Summary: Relates to community hiring and workforce development; provides employment opportunities for economically disadvantaged candidates and economically disadvantaged region candidates and apprenticeship utilization on public transactions; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof.
LawCode: Add Chap 79 §§3500 & 3501, amd §311, NYC Chart; amd §2590-h, Ed L; amd §917, Gen Muni L; amd §816-b, Lab L; amd §§1728 & 1734, Pub Auth L; amd §§5 & 8, NYC Health & Hosp Corp Act; amd §2, Chap 749 of 2019
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York city charter, the education law, the general municipal law, the labor law, the public authorities law, the New York city health and hospitals corporation act, and the New York city public works investment act, in relation to employment opportunities for economically disadvantaged candidates and economically disadvantaged region candidates and apprenticeship utilization on public transactions; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
